entry.title: OLIVE OIL CARAMEL 😮‍💨 This is what you wanna put on top of your ice cream! 🍦 RECIPE (6 servings, 5min prep time): -60ml olive oil -60ml COLD maple syrup or agave -a pinch of salt Mix until emulsified. Use like caramel and store in the fridge up to 7 days
